channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Harness engineering: leveraging Codex in an agent-first world
item.description: By Ryan Lopopolo, Member of the Technical Staff Link to article: https://openai.com/index/harness-engineering

item.title: Bringing ChatGPT to GenAI.mil
item.description: OpenAI for Government announces the deployment of a custom ChatGPT on GenAI.mil, bringing secure, safety-forward AI to U.S. defense teams. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/bringing-chatgpt-to-genaimil

item.title: Testing ads in ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI begins testing ads in ChatGPT to support free access, with clear labeling, answer independence, strong privacy protections, and user control. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/testing-ads-in-chatgpt

item.title: Korea privacy policy
item.description: Korea privacy policy Link to article: https://openai.com/policies/kr-privacy-policy

item.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization
item.description: OpenAI shares its approach to AI localization, showing how globally shared frontier models can be adapted to local languages, laws, and cultures without compromising safety. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/our-approach-to-localization

item.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
item.description: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-lowers-protein-synthesis-cost

item.title: Introducing Trusted Access for Cyber
item.description: OpenAI introduces Trusted Access for Cyber, a trust-based framework that expands access to frontier cyber capabilities while strengthening safeguards against misuse. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/trusted-access-for-cyber

item.title: Introducing OpenAI Frontier
item.description: OpenAI Frontier is an enterprise platform for building, deploying, and managing AI agents with shared context, onboarding, permissions, and governance. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-openai-frontier

item.title: GPT-5.3-Codex System Card
item.description: GPT‑5.3-Codex is the most capable agentic coding model to date, combining the frontier coding performance of GPT‑5.2-Codex with the reasoning and professional knowledge capabilities of GPT‑5.2. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-3-codex-system-card

item.title: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex
item.description: GPT-5.3-Codex is a Codex-native agent that pairs frontier coding performance with general reasoning to support long-horizon, real-world technical work. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-gpt-5-3-codex

item.title: Navigating health questions with ChatGPT
item.description: A family shares how ChatGPT helped them prepare for critical cancer treatment decisions for their son alongside expert guidance from his doctors. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/navigating-health-questions

item.title: Unlocking the Codex harness: how we built the App Server
item.description: Learn how to embed the Codex agent using the Codex App Server, a bidirectional JSON-RPC API powering streaming progress, tool use, approvals, and diffs. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/unlocking-the-codex-harness

item.title: VfL Wolfsburg turns ChatGPT into a club-wide capability
item.description: By focusing on people, not pilots, the Bundesliga club is scaling efficiency, creativity, and knowledge—without losing its football identity. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/vfl-wolfsburg
